contexts.context: ...to, in his words, combine my English and German <mark>texts</mark>, and bring the whole thing up to date....
.... So we agreed that we would leave the <mark>texts</mark> to stand and that I would say, roughly,...
...English version as well." I had thought my two <mark>texts</mark> were only to be combined and the sequel written...
...zwischen Gide und Claudel. Es wurde über Wagners <mark>Texte</mark> gesprochen, über Liturgie-Reform, über Weinheber...
